title: Ascent WoW Private Server 2.3.3+
description:
Modified version of ac-web repack for faster web interface and allowing any version of wow on the server.

.nfo:

*********************************
*             Setup             *
*********************************
NOTE!! To get this repack to work you should install it into c:AC Web Ultimate Repack

First then put ad.exe and the "maps" folder into your wow directory (from the map extractor in the tools folder)

Then run ad.exe

When it has finished move the maps folder from your wow directory to your ascent dir: c:AC Web Ultimate Repackascent

Then start up the control panel (c:AC Web Ultimate RepackControl Panel.exe)

Launch the applications Mysql | Apache | Logonserver | Ascent or press "Start all"

Now open your realmlist file in your wow directory with notepad and change 

"set realmlist eu.logon.worldofwarcraft.com
" 
to 

"set realmlist 127.0.0.1"

After that just save and close realmlist.


Start wow and login with user: admin pass: admin
If you do not have The Burning Crusade Expansion Pack, login with user: admin2 pass: admin2

Now play!

If you have any trouble with the control panel, you can launch the server manually. Just open these files to do that:

AC Web Ultimate RepackServerMySQL.bat
AC Web Ultimate RepackServerApache.bat
AC Web Ultimate RepackAscentlogonserver.exe
AC Web Ultimate RepackAscentascent.exe

*********************************
*             MySQL             *
*********************************

MySQL info is -
User: root
Pass: ascent

*********************************
*   Website - account creation  *
*********************************
To create accounts go to http://localhost
If you are going to make the server public, open c:ascent repackServerhtdocsconfig.php with notepad, and edit it for your needs e.g server name and such. 

*********************************
*            Other              *
*********************************
at http://wiki.ascentemu.com is alot of info about commands and such that can be used.
There are custom vendors on GM Island (type .recall port gmisland to get there), their IDs go from 50000 - 50078
There is also a teleporter NPC on GM Island, it&#039;s ID is 822334.

*********************************
*            Thanks             *
*********************************

Mainly reason for this repack is becuse the web ui is a bit more clean but also faster, not many furures though its not needed to play.
